attributes.review: Ok so I downloaded this app because I was scrolling through tik tok and someone said if trump gets re elected he’s going take away tik tok and I’m not having it. So when I downloaded this app it was really slow and glitching an 🍊 on my screen for more than 30 minutes. It made my whole phone slow and glitchy. It was horrible. Basically don’t download and give a bad review🤩

attributes.review:
the first ☝️ thing i saw when i got this app was a spinning 🌀 image of an orange 🍊 with a toupee 😭😭. i have no idea 🤷‍♀️ what it was, but then my cat 🐈 walked over to look 👀 at it and had a stroke immediately. then these dudes 🐀 came into my house 🏠 and made a circle ⭕️ around my cat 🐱 and lit a fire 🔥 then repeatedly chanted "trump 2020" you will be hearing 👂 from my lawyers. if 👁 could give this negative stars✨i would. 

also
[HAWAIIANS AGAINST TRUMP 2020]
attributes.title: a new cause of strokes?

attributes.review: This app is just horrible. After I downloaded it my phone shut off and then it over heated. Once I finally was able to use the app it said that only people over the age of 30 can sign up. I then tried to delete the app but the National anthem started to play on not only my phone but my tv too. This was just a huge waste of my time. DO NOT GET THIS!!!!

attributes.review: I like Donald Trump overall but his plan to ban TikTok in the USA is just so wrong. Kids, teens, and adults that have TikTok have the freedom to post appropriate videos, and make others days. In my opinion and many others, our life without TikTok would be ruined and i know that sounds pathetic and stupid but it’s true. Please don’t ban TikTok across the US. Thank you.
attributes.title: Donald Trump Administration

attributes.review: Do not get this app. Once I opened the app it immediately glitches!  All I saw was a blurry orange face when I opened the app. Also, why is there an app that supports a sexist, racist, and homophobic president? He’s done nothing to make ‘America great again,’ all he’s done is made it worst. If you give this app five stars or you support Trump, remember that you too, like Trump, is racist, homophobic, and a sexist! This app also gave me a ton of viruses.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
